full_summary:
======================================

### Tender Announcement: Confederation Building Generator System Compliance Upgrades

#### Solicitation Number
* WS4287326191

#### Amendment Number
* 4

#### Publication Date
* 2023-11-14

#### Tender Closing Date
* 2023-12-15T14:00:00

#### Amendment Date
* 2023-12-05

#### Expected Contract Start Date
* 2023-12-01

#### Expected Contract End Date
* None

#### Tender Status
* Expired

#### UNSPC Code
* 25172400 (Fuel tanks and systems)

#### Procurement Category
* Contracts for Non-Construction Services and Tools (CNST)

#### Procurement Method
* Competitive - Open bidding

#### Request Type
* 
### Request for Proposal

#### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a proposal to perform upgrades to the existing fuel system at the Confederation Building to comply with current CSA standards and TSSA regulations. The work includes replacement of the fuel day tank and installation of a new fuel storage tank and ancillary equipment.

#### Selection Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Delivery
* National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contracting Entity
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information
* Olga Mitskaniouk, (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [olga.mitskaniouk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:olga.mitskaniouk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17942365

### Notice Period
This notice was originally published on 2023-11-14.

We made the following changes:

* Reformatted the text into sections with clear headings
* Standardized format and removed unnecessary information
* Clarify some sentences for better understanding
* Standardized the English translation to avoid any confusion.

Note: made some minor changes to follow Markdown format and readability best practices.
